thread.title: Absolutely faultless! Review
thread.title_full: Absolutely faultless! - Review of Phoenix Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Roselle G
title: Absolutely faultless! Review
text:
This was my very first visit to London so I was quite apprehensive about food and accommodation. I needn't have worried because our stay at the Phoenix hotel was pleasant in every way. Our room was spotlessly clean, very comfortable, warm and quiet. Breakfast was very good while the staff were always very friendly whilst at the same time discreet and efficient. The location of the hotel is central and we were able to enjoy a daily lea surly walk through Hyde Park after breakfast. We came with family which included a seven month old baby whose needs were totally adhered to. We would sincerely like to thank all the staff for providing us with a home away from home. We'll be sure to visit you again in the near future.
